SCTX:
Begin MuseumRingPhynaster

if ("Torasa Aram".ringphynaster < 2)
	Disable
endif

if ("Torasa Aram".ringphynaster == 2)
	Enable
endif

if (OnActivate == 1)
	set "Torasa Aram".ringphynaster to 3
	Activate
	player->removeitem "ring_phynaster_unique_x" 1
	player->additem "ring_phynaster_unique" 1
endif


End MuseumRingPhynaster
